info.title: Open Tree Hole

post.description: Create a hole, create tags and floor binding to it and set the name mapping

delete.description: Delete a division and move all of its holes to another given division

post.summary: Old API for Creating A Floor

parameters.description: 1 is like, 0 is reset, -1 is dislike
parameters.name: like

post.description: Restore A Floor From A History Version

post.summary: Old API for Creating A Hole

delete.description: Hide a hole, but visible to admins. This may affect many floors, DO NOT ABUSE!!!

delete.description: Mark a report as "dealt" and send notification to reporter
Delete a tag and link all of its holes to another given tag

to.description:
Admin only
ID of the target division that all the deleted division's holes will be moved to

reply_to.description: id of the floor to which replied
id of the floor to which replied

content.description: Owner or admin, the original content should be moved to  floor_history

like.description: All user, deprecated, "add" is like, "cancel" is reset

disliked.description: whether the user has disliked the floor, dynamically generated

is_me.description: whether the user is the author of the floor, dynamically generated

liked.description: whether the user has liked the floor, dynamically generated

mention.description: many to many mentions (in different holes)

storey.description: the sequence of floors in a hole

user_id.description: The one who modified the floor

result.description: The deal result, send it to reporter

to.description:
Admin only
Name of the target tag that all the deleted tag's holes will be connected to
